SPIN_DESC: Kuna buƙatar barin bayani a cikin bayanin kula idan kuna neman canja wuri, za mu tuntuɓar ku ta bayanin da aka bayar.
CONTACT_EMAIL: Da fatan za a tuntuɓe mu ta imel
PERSONAL_NOTE: Lura: Ba za ku iya samun kyautar ba idan bayanin ba daidai ba ne
HELP_1: 1. Kuna iya shiga cikin spins kyauta.
HELP_2: 2. Za a tuntubi wanda ya fi kowa sa'a a ba shi kyautar
INCORRECT: Sunan mai amfani ko kalmar sirri ba daidai ba.
VALIDATION_USERNAME_REQUIRED: Dole ne ku saka sunan mai amfani
USER_ALREADY: Sunan mai amfani ya riga ya wanzu a cikin tsarin.
VALIDATION_PASS_LENGTH: Dole ne kalmar wucewa ta kasance tana da aƙalla haruffa 6
VALIDATION_PASS_REQUIRED: Dole ne ku saka kalmar sirri
LOST: Yi hakuri! Ba ku ci kyautar ba tukuna
LINK_SHARE: Hanyar hanyar sadarwar ku don ƙara ƙimar nasara
